#summary Where to download JSimpleDB

JSimpleDB is availble via Maven Central:

<code language="xml">
    <dependency> 
        <groupId>org.jsimpledb</groupId> 
        <artifactId>jsimpledb</artifactId> 
        <version>1.1.748</version> 
    </dependency></code>

or from the [http://ivyroundup.googlecode.com/ Ivy RoundUp] ivy repository:

<code language="xml">
    <dependency org="org.jsimpledb" name="jsimpledb"/></code>

There is also a traditional distribution ZIP file that contains executable JARs for the command line interface (CLI) and graphical user interface (GUI), as well as a demonstration database you can play with. The distribution ZIP file, as well as the Maven artifacts mentioned above, are available here:

  * [https://s3.amazonaws.com/archie-public/jsimpledb/jsimpledb-1.1.748.zip jsimpledb-1.1.748.zip] - Distribution ZIP file
  * [https://s3.amazonaws.com/archie-public/jsimpledb/jsimpledb-1.1.748.jar jsimpledb-1.1.748.jar] - Main JAR file
  * [https://s3.amazonaws.com/archie-public/jsimpledb/jsimpledb-cli-1.1.748.jar jsimpledb-cli-1.1.748.jar] - CLI classes
  * [https://s3.amazonaws.com/archie-public/jsimpledb/jsimpledb-gui-1.1.748.jar jsimpledb-gui-1.1.748.jar] - GUI classes
  * [https://s3.amazonaws.com/archie-public/jsimpledb/jsimpledb-spring-1.1.748.jar jsimpledb-spring-1.1.748.jar] - Spring Framework support classes
  * [https://s3.amazonaws.com/archie-public/jsimpledb/jsimpledb-javadoc-1.1.748.jar jsimpledb-javadoc-1.1.748.jar] - API Javadocs
  * [https://s3.amazonaws.com/archie-public/jsimpledb/jsimpledb-sources-1.1.748.jar jsimpledb-sources-1.1.748.jar] - Library source files

Changes are noted [http://jsimpledb.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/CHANGES.txt here].
